message: I think this is a fair split, considering you get to keep all the money you get, and I have to deal with inflation.
Let's be fair, I'll take 9000, you take 1000.  It's a better deal than your offer, and we can avoid the inflation penalty.
I'm willing to give you a bit more this time, but I still need a good chunk of the money.  We both know the inflation hurts me more than you. Let's make a deal before it gets too late.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal than last round, but I'm still going to take the majority.  We need to make a deal before the inflation really kicks in.
This is my final offer.  Inflation is really starting to hurt now, and if we don't reach an agreement soon, we'll both lose a lot.  Let's be reasonable and settle this.
I'm getting tired of this game, but I'm still willing to compromise. Let's split it 70/30, and avoid the risk of getting nothing.
